Author: Anne HK
Description:
Better Resource Panel and Idle Villager Icon 優化資源版面及閒置村民按鈕

Amended as follows 修改如下:

  • Increase the font size and change the font color (resource worker) in the resource panel. 修改了資源列表中各資源村民數量的字體大小和顏色
  • Replace the idle villager icon with more eye-catching red icon. 替換了原有閒置村民的圖示 ，改做搶眼的紅色圖示

Many thanks for 筆電玩世紀's suggestions
特別鳴謝: 筆電玩世紀 的意見提供

Please feel free to contact me , if you have any questions about this mod.
如對此模組有任何疑問，請聯絡我
